mapper.sql: id, biz_id, seal_car_code, operate_site_id, product_type, should_scan_count, actual_scan_count, intercept_should_scan_count, intercept_actual_scan_count, intercept_not_scan_count, more_scan_local_count, more_scan_out_count, more_scan_total_count, total_seal_package_count, total_scanned_package_count, create_time, yn, ts, board_code, actual_scan_waybill_count, total_scanned_board_count, total_seal_waybill_count, total_scanned_waybill_count, total_scanned_intercept_waybill_count, total_should_intercept_waybill_count, total_more_scan_local_waybill_count, total_more_scan_out_waybill_count
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO uat_jy_unload_aggs (id, biz_id, seal_car_code, operate_site_id, product_type, should_scan_count, actual_scan_count, intercept_should_scan_count, intercept_actual_scan_count, intercept_not_scan_count, more_scan_local_count, more_scan_out_count, more_scan_total_count, total_seal_package_count, total_scanned_package_count, create_time, yn) VALUES (#{id}, #{bizId}, #{sealCarCode}, #{operateSiteId}, #{productType}, #{shouldScanCount}, #{actualScanCount}, #{interceptShouldScanCount}, #{interceptActualScanCount}, #{interceptNotScanCount}, #{moreScanLocalCount}, #{moreScanOutCount}, #{moreScanTotalCount}, #{totalSealPackageCount}, #{totalScannedPackageCount}, NOW(), 1)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM uat_jy_unload_aggs WHERE yn = 1 AND biz_id = #{bizId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT SUM(should_scan_count) should_scan_count, SUM(actual_scan_count) actual_scan_count, SUM(intercept_should_scan_count) intercept_should_scan_count, SUM(intercept_actual_scan_count) intercept_actual_scan_count, SUM(more_scan_local_count) more_scan_local_count, SUM(more_scan_out_count) more_scan_out_count, sum(more_scan_total_count) more_scan_total_count, total_seal_package_count, total_scanned_package_count FROM uat_jy_unload_aggs WHERE yn = 1 and biz_id = #{bizId}
and board_code =#{boardCode}

SELECT SUM(should_scan_count) should_scan_count, SUM(actual_scan_count) actual_scan_count, SUM(more_scan_local_count) more_scan_local_count, SUM(more_scan_out_count) more_scan_out_count FROM uat_jy_unload_aggs WHERE yn = 1 and biz_id = #{bizId}

SELECT total_seal_waybill_count, total_scanned_waybill_count, total_should_intercept_waybill_count, total_scanned_intercept_waybill_count, total_more_scan_local_waybill_count, total_more_scan_out_waybill_count, total_seal_package_count, total_scanned_package_count FROM uat_jy_unload_aggs WHERE biz_id = #{bizId} and yn = 1 limit 1
